amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $1,241,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriation for the Office of the Secretary and Executive Management by $1,241.000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 198 (Roll no. 467).
